title: paramapavani
sahitya:
parama pAvani mAmava parvatarAja putrikE ambE

anupallavi

suravara kinnara sannutE shObhana guNajAtE lalitE kara dhrta
pAshAnkusha suma vishikEkSu cApE kAncipura vAsini shrI kAmAkSi

caraNam

caraNa vinata sura gaNapati su-manOgaNE kara sarasija dhrta maNi vINE
candra vadanE
paramEshvari sEvaka jana rakSakE sadA praNata phaladE sadA praNata
phaladAyikE
bhaNDana khaNDana bhaNDa mahiSa mukha caNDa daitya maNDalE ripudaNDE
